response.original_title: If Women Are Guitars, Then What's a Man?
response.overview: Three best friends / band-mates must join heads, hands & musical instruments in order to stop their vicious manager from brutally murdering the terrific trifecta before the end of the 2022 Oscars.
response.tagline: "Sex, Drugs & Rock 'n' Roll!" ... Minus all of sex, most of the drugs, and a questionable amount of what few would call music.
response.title: If Women Are Guitars, Then What's a Man?
